ygData.subject: Re: Please DON'T do this with your bard
ygData.msgSnippet: Complain?  I m not complaining - I am stating an opinion . Bards are one of the few classes people don t seem to have reservations about - druids and wizards
ygData.messageBody:
Complain? I'm not complaining - I am stating an 'opinion'. Bards are one
of the few classes people don't seem to have reservations about - druids
and wizards both tend to have bottom of the barrel reputations as a class -
I don't want people lumping bards in with it.

Sorry YOU don't like caps and quotes - I type like I would speak - and yes,
I do put emphasis on certain words.



At 12:58 PM 11/23/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
>> Is it just me, or does anyone else have a problem with a member of our own
>> class engaging in behavior that is so intrusive of others? It's bad when I
>> do something dumb and endanger myself, or my group - endangering bystanders
>> is just unforgiveable in my book, especially when it's unnecessary.
>
> You do nothing but complain on this list. And you don't even
> sign your name. I'm a little concerned that you have some built
> up anger inside. (I've mentioned it before through the use of
> your "quotation marks" and CAPITALIZATION.) Is there something
> we can do to calm you down?
>
> Harmonic.
